com.ooyala.android.ads.vast

Class VASTAdPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.ooyala.android.player.Player
        • com.ooyala.android.player.MoviePlayer
          • com.ooyala.android.player.AdMoviePlayer
            • com.ooyala.android.ads.vast.VASTAdPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AdsLearnMoreInterface, PlayerInterface, LifeCycleInterface, java.util.Observer

    public class VASTAdPlayer
extends AdMoviePlayer
    A MoviePlayer which helps render VAST advertisements
